text:
Hey Kason,
If you look at your logs, you'll see that its having issues pulling the git repo. Have you installed git on your machine? It doesnt seem to be able to find the command

Hey all - this might be a really dumb question but I'm having issues with the drag and drop section. The modules I include seem to ignore the width i put in and resize automatically, and I dont have a draggable resize bar showing up when using a section? Am I missing something?
